channel.title: Server Side Issues
channel.description:
Am having troubles with a Runescape private server, the server was released with an anti leach. Need a little assistance with the anti leach.
I plan on using the server for playing with friends, should be a fun past time.
I know the basics when it comes to programming, and I think I can figure out what does what pretty easily. I have a little experience with C/C++
The problem I am having is a connection problem, the server disconnects the client because the client is seen as being "Null". I am pretty sure I know where the block of code that is doing this is located, but I do not know what the original/fixed block should look like.
I am pretty sure this is server sided mainly because the refusal of the client is happening on the servers side and the server is calling the client "Null". Can only find where the server calls the client null, no where can I find the Client claiming to be null. [img]http://puu.sh/5TdUV.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/5TbCC.png[/img]
You can download the files from here [url=http://uppit.com/bzipad0j2hb4/January15al.rar]http://uppit.com/bzipad0j2hb4/January15al.rar[/url] [url=https://www.virustotal.com/en/file/efda4d30f49d546ade18c6650c07c8a135bd5baae94c38ab4b0dd8470ff7d612/analysis/1387581099/]Virus Scan[/url]
So would it be the clienthandler calling it null, and disconnecting? I am looking around now.
---------------------EDIT---------------------------'
Now I am looing at the client.java in the server files, Looking around for the clienthandler.

item.title: Server Side Issues
item.dc:creator: @igotshotman igotshotman
item.description:
@igotshotman wrote:

Am having troubles with a Runescape private server, the server was released with an anti leach. Need a little assistance with the anti leach.

I plan on using the server for playing with friends, should be a fun past time.

I know the basics when it comes to programming, and I think I can figure out what does what pretty easily. I have a little experience with C/C++

The problem I am having is a connection problem, the server disconnects the client because the client is seen as being “Null”. I am pretty sure I know where the block of code that is doing this is located, but I do not know what the original/fixed block should look like.

I am pretty sure this is server sided mainly because the refusal of the client is happening on the servers side and the server is calling the client “Null”. Can only find where the server calls the client null, no where can I find the Client claiming to be null.

You can download the files from here http://uppit.com/bzipad0j2hb4/January15al.rar Virus Scan

So would it be the clienthandler calling it null, and disconnecting? I am looking around now.

---------------------EDIT---------------------------’

Now I am looing at the client.java in the server files, Looking around for the clienthandler.
